channel.title: Schurz|Mineral County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Schurz|Mineral County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: Begin US-95A (US-95 Alternate) in Schurz
item.description: Begin US-95A (US-95 Alternate) in Schurz. The US-95A shield is commonplace on the stretch of highway between Schurz and Silver Springs. North of Silver Springs the US-95 with the ALT banner is used.

item.title: US-95 Alt. North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-95 Alt. north. Distance to Yerington, Carson City (via US-50), and Reno (via I-80).

item.title: US-95 South at US-95 Alt.
item.description: US-95 south at US-95 Alt North in Schurz. This is the southern terminus of US-95 Alt.

item.title: US-95 North - Schurz
item.description: Schurz - Elevation 4,126 on US-95 north. Schurz is home to the Walker River Paiute Tribe.

item.title: US-95 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-95 north. Distance to Fallon, Lovelock, and Winnemucca. This sign was upgraded to the Clearview font since the last time I photographed it in 2006.

item.title: US-95 North at Alt. US-95 North
item.description: US-95 North at Alt. US-95 North to Yerington. Continue north on US-95 for Fallon. Alt. US-95 rejoins US-95 north of Fallon at I-80.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching Alt. US-95
item.description: US-95 north Approaching Alt. US-95 to Carson City and Yerington.

item.title: US-95 North Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-95 just north of US-95A junction to Fallon, Lovelock, and Winnemucca

item.title: US-95 South/US-95 Alt.
item.description: US-95 south at Alt US-95 north to Yerrington
